comments:
Description:
Dataset related design files throw assertion exception when run engine smoke 
using report runner.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using reportrunner to run design files containing design files(attached 
file).

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
SEVERE: Error:
java.lang.AssertionError
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.ComputedColumnHelper.<init>
(ComputedColumnHelper.java:64)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery$Executor.populateOdiQuery
(PreparedQuery.java:873)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedExtendedDSQuery$ExtendedDSQueryExecuto
r.populateOdiQuery(PreparedExtendedDSQuery.java:251)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery$Executor.prepareExecution
(PreparedQuery.java:555)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery$Executor.access$000
(PreparedQuery.java:429)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery.doPrepare
(PreparedQuery.java:209)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedDataSourceQuery.execute
(PreparedDataSourceQuery.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine.execute
(DteDataEngine.java:220)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportItemExecutor.openResultSet
(ReportItemExecutor.java:140)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.GridItemExecutor.execute
(GridItemExecutor.java:72)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitGridItem
(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:342)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.GridItemDesign.accept
(GridItemDesign.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute
(ReportExecutor.java:162)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run
(RunAndRenderTask.java:159)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.executeReport
(ReportRunner.java:174)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute
(ReportRunner.java:115)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main
(ReportRunner.java:86)
line 1 column 1 - Warning: inserting missing 'title' element

Created an attachment (id=28273)
one dataset related file
The bug is fixed together with the code that fixing bugzilla bug 112582.
